link.title: Flourish PHP Unframeworks
link.description: Flourish provides a strong, base set of PHP classes that run pretty much anywhere, helping you focus on solving more interesting problems.

link.title: Free Code Tools
link.description: FreeCodeTools project was created to help you to do stuff faster. Its free and always will be.

link.title: FOSSMINT
link.description: F.O.S.S Mint (Free Open Source Software) is a branched off project from TecMint, a Linux-focused website that was established in 2012.
